Speaker: Midna
Text: (This is definitely the right town. Which building could be the tavern?)
Near the end of the oasis, a sign reads 'The Sandy Sphinx'.

Speaker: Midna
Text: (knock knock) Salutations, is this the tavern that outsiders were directed to gather at?

Speaker: Sasheen
Text: Why yes it is! Welcome to the Sandy Sphinx!

Speaker: Sasheen
Text: I'll be right with you, please let me find you a seat.
the barista smiles and shows her inside.

Speaker: Gunter
Text: Well Bularia, this is it. Finally some Godsdamned food.

Speaker: Bularia
Text: Oh HELL yeah! I haven't had anything but sand since yesterday!

Speaker: Gunter
Text: HA! Ain't that the truth. Preach it, sister! I'm parched, let's get to it.
The Rowdy pair throw wide the wooden tavern doors.

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: Mm'kay, there ain't no bloomin' way tha' I missed an enti're town...

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: 'SPECIALLY NOT ONE THIS BLOODY COOL! They got all sorts of folks, a pool, AND a tavern!

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: when'n the Noine Hells did this get here...?

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: ah, doesn' ma'ah-fock it, that tavern has a gorgeous stage-

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: I cahn' wai' to spread my people's fines' dahnces from it!
The free air spirit glides through the opened doors.

Speaker: Sasheen
Text: Well, the tavern's all but full, I had better begin the briefing...
